meanings.sent1: The multibladed knife was very sharp.
meanings.sent2: The lawnmower had a multibladed cutting mechanism.
meanings.sent3: The chef's multibladed knife danced through the vegetables with ease.
meanings.sent4: Her multibladed scissors swiftly cut through the paper like a hot knife through butter.
meanings.sent5: The windmill's multibladed design efficiently captured the wind's energy.

meanings.definition: Consisting of more than one blade.
meanings.sent1: The multibladed fan provided a cool breeze in the room.
meanings.sent2: The helicopter had a multibladed rotor for stability.
meanings.sent3: The multibladed blender made quick work of the ingredients.
meanings.sent4: The multibladed razor gave a smooth shave in one stroke.
meanings.sent5: The multibladed scissors were perfect for cutting fabric in one go.
